name: 黃淵祥
objective: 基本熱傳機構，穩態與非穩態熱傳導其包括有內部熱源之系統。內部及外部之強制及自然對流。表面及氣體間之輻射。利用因次方法及邊界層來考量熱傳。
schedule:
1-4週 Introduction to Tensor Analysis
5週 Mechanisms of Energy Transport
6-9週 Shell Energy Balance
10-13週 The Equations of Change for Nonisothermal Systems
14-18週 Temp. Distributions with More than One Independent Variable
scorePolicy:
平時成績：20％
期中與期末考：80％
materials: R.B. Bird, W.E. Stewart, and E.N. Lightfoot, ”Transport Phenomena”  2nd edition, Wiley, 2002
